General.Name: Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited
General.Description: Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, repairs, and maintains fire protection equipment and systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Fire Protection Equipment and Systems, and Project Works and Services. It offers safety products. Including PPE, absorbents, gas detector, lockout tagout, spill containment, shower and eyewash, fire fighting suits, and flammable cabinet; grooved couplings and fittings; fire suppression systems; fire alarm system; cold water and sanitary valve; fire pump flow meter; and pressure relief valve. The company also provides fire protection products comprising equipment and valve, foam system, sprinkler and nozzle, fire extinguisher, deluge system, and preaction system; and fire resistant cable. Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
